languages.text: Покинув отсек астропатического хора, этот прыжок я провел в Святилище Навигатора. Не смею описывать, какие ужасы я наблюдал там, и как скорбело мое сердце над каждым из десятков павших во время перехода. Варп был безжалостен к нам, и лишь удача помогла мне ускользнуть от случившейся там кровавой жатвы.

traits.locale_text: Покинув отсек астропатического хора, этот прыжок я провел на навигационной палубе. Не смею описывать, какие ужасы я наблюдал там, и как скорбело мое сердцо над каждым из десятков павших во время перехода. Варп был безжалостен к нам, и лишь удача помогла мне ускользнуть от случившейся там кровавой жатвы.

languages.text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.
languages.original_text: Покинув отсек астропатического хора, этот прыжок я провел в Святилище Навигатора. Не смею описывать, какие ужасы я наблюдал там, и как скорбело мое сердце над каждым из десятков павших во время перехода. Варп был безжалостен к нам, и лишь удача помогла мне ускользнуть от случившейся там кровавой жатвы.

traits.locale_text: I left the astropathic choir section and spent this jump on the lower navigation deck with the Navigator's servants. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished during the crossing. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished during the crossing. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

I left the astropathic choir section and spent this jump on the lower navigation deck with the Navigator's servants. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished during the crossing. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

I left the Astropathic Choir section and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished during the crossing. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

I left the Astropathic Choir section and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished during the crossing. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

languages.text: Dejé el Coro de Astrópatas y pasé este salto en el sanctum de navegantes. No me atrevo a describir los horrores de los que fui testigo, ni el pesar que siento por todos los que murieron durante esta travesía. La disformidad no tuvo compasión alguna y solo la suerte me permitió sobrevivir a la sangrienta masacre.
languages.original_text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

traits.locale_text: Dejé el coro de astrópatas y pasé este salto en el sanctum de navegantes. No me atrevo a describir los horrores de los que fui testigo, ni el pesar que siento por todos los que murieron durante la travesía. La disformidad no tuvo compasión alguna y solo la suerte me permitió sobrevivir a la sangrienta masacre.

languages.text: 我离开了星语唱诗班，在导航者圣所中度过了这次亚空间跳跃。我不敢描述在那里看到了怎样的恐怖景象，也不敢描述当我看到那几十位在跳跃过程中丧生的船员时，心中有多么悲痛。亚空间无情地对待我们，而我仅仅是运气好，才逃脱了它血腥的收割。
languages.original_text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

traits.locale_text: 我离开了星语唱诗班，在导航者圣所中度过了这次亚空间跳跃。我不敢描述在那里看到了怎样的恐怖景象，也不敢描述当我看到那几十位在跳跃过程中丧生的船员时，心中有多么悲痛。亚空间无情地对待我们，而我仅仅是运气好，才逃脱了它血腥的收割。

languages.text: 感応通信聖歌隊のベイを離れ、ジャンプ中は航宙士のサンクトゥムで過ごした。そこで目撃した恐怖や、この旅で命を落とした数十人ひとりひとりを思って感じる心の内の悲しみを、あえて説明するつもりはない。歪みは我々に容赦することもなく、私が死の鎌を振る『血の収穫者』を回避できたのは、ただツイていただけだ。
languages.original_text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

traits.locale_text: 感応通信聖歌隊のベイを離れ、ジャンプ中は航宙士のサンクトゥムで過ごした。そこで目撃した恐怖や、この旅で命を落とした数十人ひとりひとりを思って感じる心の内の悲しみを、あえて説明するつもりはない。歪みは我々に容赦することもなく、私が死の鎌を振る『血の収穫者』を回避できたのは、ただツイていただけだ。

languages.text: Ich verließ die Abteilung des Astropathischen Chors und verbrachte diesen Sprung im Navigator-Sanctum. Ich wage es nicht, die dort beobachteten Schrecken zu beschreiben, und auch nicht meinen Herzschmerz für all die Dutzende, die auf dieser Reise zu Tode kamen. Der Warp zeigte uns gegenüber keine Gnade, und nur durch Glück entging ich seiner blutigen Ernte dort.
languages.original_text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

languages.text: J'ai quitté le chœur astropathique pour effectuer ce saut dans le sanctum de navigation. Je n'ose décrire les horreurs dont j'ai été témoin là-bas, ni combien mon cœur saigne à l'évocation de celles et ceux qui ont péri par dizaine au cours de la traversée. Le Warp s'est montré impitoyable envers nous, et seule la chance m'a permis d'échapper à sa sanglante moisson.
languages.original_text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

traits.locale_text: J'ai quitté le chœur astropathique pour effectuer ce saut dans le sanctum de navigation. Je n'ose décrire les horreurs dont j'ai été témoin là-bas, ni combien mon cœur saigne à l'évocation de celles et ceux qui ont péri par dizaine au cours de la traversée. Le Warp s'est montré impitoyable envers nous, et seule la chance m'a permis d'échapper à sa sanglante moisson.

languages.text: Astropatik Koro bölmesinden ayrılıp bu sıçramayı Rotacı'nın Kutağı'nda geçirdim. Orada şahit olduğum dehşetleri veya yolculuk esnasında yiten onlarca can için yüreğimin nasıl yandığını tarif etmeye cüret dahi edemem. Öteboyut bize karşı acımasızdı ve orada gerçekleşen kanlı hasattan yalnızca şans eseri sağ çıkabildim.
languages.original_text: I left the Astropathic Choir bay and spent this jump in the Navigator's Sanctum. I do not dare describe the horrors I witnessed there, or how my heart grieves for every one of the dozens who perished on this journey. The warp was merciless toward us, and only luck allowed me to escape the bloody harvest it reaped there.

traits.locale_text: Astropatik Koro bölmesinden ayrılıp bu sıçramayı Rotacı'nın Kutağı'nda geçirdim. Orada şahit olduğum dehşetleri veya yolculuk esnasında yiten onlarca can için yüreğimin nasıl yandığını tarif etmeye cüret dahi edemem. Öteboyut bize karşı acımasızdı ve orada gerçekleşen kanlı hasattan yalnızca şans eseri sağ çıkabildim.
